name: Castle Raider V2
description:
Grab as much treasure as you can and make it through the castle alive!

Keyboard & Xbox controllers are supported.

Press Alt + Enter to toggle Fullscreen mode.

Arrows or WASD = Movement, Space = Attack , Shift = Block, X = Open .

My first game made following Peter Morgans Udemy tutorial.

Please feel free to provide feedback that can inspire ideas for my next project.
